definition: one of a set of small pieces of stiff paper marked in various ways and used for playing games or for telling fortunes, to ask someone for identification to determine whether he or she is old enough to consume liquor
details:
noun
- one of a set of small pieces of stiff paper marked in various ways and used for playing games or for telling fortunes
= example: one of a set of small pieces of stiff paper marked in various ways and used for playing games or for telling fortunes
- a printed circuit that can be inserted into expansion slots in a computer to increase the computer's capabilities
= synonyms: board
- a card certifying the identity of the bearer
= example: a card certifying the identity of the bearer
= synonyms: identity card
- (baseball) a list of batters in the order in which they will bat
= example: (baseball) a list of batters in the order in which they will bat
= synonyms: batting order, lineup
- a list of dishes available at a restaurant
= synonyms: menu, bill of fare, carte du jour, carte
- (golf) a record of scores (as in golf)
= example: (golf) a record of scores (as in golf)
= synonyms: scorecard
- a rectangular piece of stiff paper used to send messages, which may have printed greetings or pictures
= example: a rectangular piece of stiff paper used to send messages, which may have printed greetings or pictures
- a printed or written greeting that is left to indicate that you have visited
= synonyms: calling card
- a sign posted in a public place as an advertisement
= synonyms: posting
- a witty amusing person who makes jokes
= synonyms: wag
- thin cardboard, usually rectangular
verb
- to ask someone for identification to determine whether he or she is old enough to consume liquor
= example: to ask someone for identification to determine whether he or she is old enough to consume liquor
- to separate the fibers of
= example: to separate the fibers of
= synonyms: tease
